mapper.select: SELECT a.id, a.job_number jobNumber, a.user_name userName, a.company_id companyId, a.department_id departmentId, a.job_id jobId, IFNULL(a.job_score_id, '') jobScoreId FROM sys_eve_user_staff a WHERE a.id = #{staffId}

SELECT a.id, a.company_id companyId, a.department_id departmentId, a.job_id jobId, IFNULL(a.job_score_id, '') jobScoreId, a.state, a.type, a.act_wages actWages FROM sys_eve_user_staff a WHERE date_format(a.entry_time, '%Y-%m') <= #{lastMonthDate} AND IF(LENGTH(a.quit_time) > 0 AND a.quit_time != '', date_format(a.quit_time, '%Y-%m') >= #{lastMonthDate}, 0 = 0) AND a.id NOT IN (SELECT b.staff_id FROM wages_payment_history b WHERE b.staff_id = a.id AND b.pay_month = #{lastMonthDate}) AND a.design_wages = 2
AND a.id NOT IN
#{item}
LIMIT 1

SELECT a.check_date checkDate, a.clock_in clockIn, a.time_id timeId, a.clock_in_state clockInState, IFNULL(a.clock_out, '') clockOut, IFNULL(a.clock_out_state, '') clockOutState, a.state FROM check_work a, sys_eve_user_staff b WHERE a.create_id = b.user_id AND b.id = #{staffId} AND date_format(a.check_date, '%Y-%m') = #{lastMonthDate}

SELECT b.leave_type leaveType, b.leave_day leaveDay, b.leave_start_time leaveStartTime, b.leave_end_time leaveEndTime, b.time_id timeId, b.use_year_holiday useYearHoliday FROM check_work_leave a, check_work_leave_time_slot b, sys_eve_user_staff c WHERE a.create_id = c.id AND a.id = b.leave_id AND a.state = 2 AND b.state = 2 AND c.id = #{staffId} AND date_format(b.leave_day, '%Y-%m') = #{lastMonthDate}

mapper.select: SELECT a.pay_month payMonth, a.wages_json wagesJson, CONVERT(a.act_wages, decimal(24, 2)) actWages, a.type, a.state FROM wages_payment_history a WHERE a.staff_id = #{staffId} AND a.pay_month = #{payMonth}

SELECT b.cancel_day cancelDay, b.cancel_start_time cancelStartTime, b.cancel_end_time cancelEndTime, b.cancel_hour cancelHour FROM check_work_cancel_leave a, check_work_cancel_leave_time_slot b, sys_eve_user_staff c WHERE a.create_id = c.id AND a.id = b.cancel_leave_id AND a.state = 2 AND b.state = 2 AND c.id = #{staffId} AND date_format(b.cancel_day, '%Y-%m') = #{lastMonthDate}
